body:
There's definitely something weird going on.

I added a log to the functional component's render function to inspect the slots that are received:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1444526/37328560-e8acf22c-269a-11e8-975b-94b635ebe320.png)

The weird thing is that it's rendered twice (can be explained for itself), but once it receives the slot as "namedSlot", and once as "default", even though the setup is the same.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1444526/37328545-dda847c8-269a-11e8-9b51-5a5ff98abdb3.png)


https://jsfiddle.net/dronjdzm/70/

I'm afraid not render it is right.

see: https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/dev/test/unit/features/component/component-slot.spec.js#L828-L857

@gebilaoxiong I'm not sure that test case applies to the situation we have here, can you elaborate?

The test case you linked to incorporates one functional component passing slot content to another. That's a different situation that ours in this issue.

@LinusBorg I did a simple example: https://jsfiddle.net/dronjdzm/75/ I think the difference in understanding is on the template of CompB ```javascript const CompB = { props: ['state'], components: { CompA }, template: `
{{ state.prop }}
` }; ``` When CompB is rendered, it generates a structure similar to the follow vnodeï¼š ```html
THIS TEXT SHOULD RENDER {{ state.prop }}
``` When CompA is rendered, the slots is: ```js { slotA: [Vnode], // span element default: [Vnode] // state.prop } ``` so I think not render it is right.

Perhaps the `slot="slotA"` on the `span` should be deleted when the CompB is rendered.

Maybe you're right

repository.name: bootstrap-vue
repository.description: BootstrapVue provides one of the most comprehensive implementations of Bootstrap v4 for Vue.js. With extensive and automated WAI-ARIA accessibility markup.

issue.body: First of, thanks for all your hard work and time. The b-card footer (and header) template slot appears to have stopped working in v2.0.0-rc.2. ``` Some header content Some content Some footer content ``` The header and footer content are not displayed (where they previously did). - Operating system and version: Mac High Sierra - Browser and version: Chrome Version 65.0.3325.162 (Official Build) (64-bit) - Version of Bootstrap-Vue that you are using: v2.0.0-rc.2 - Reduced test cases: [https://jsfiddle.net/h1h9g4h2/](https://jsfiddle.net/h1h9g4h2/)

issue.body:
Bumps [vue](https://github.com/vuejs/vue) from 2.5.15 to 2.5.16.
Release notes *Sourced from vue's [releases](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/releases).* > ## v2.5.16 > ### Bug Fixes > > * allow multiline expression in v-for 71b4b25, closes [#7792](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7792) > * fix keyName checking for arrow keys in IE11 4378fc5, closes [#7806](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7806) > * fix regression on duplicate component init when using shared data objects 984927a, closes [#7805](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7805) > * **core:** Make set/delete warning condition for undefined, null and ([#7818](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7818)) 9084747, closes [#7818](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7818) [#7452](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7452) > * **keep-alive:** run prune after render for correct active component check 215f877, closes [#7566](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7566) > * **model:** fix static input type being overwritten by v-bind object ([#7819](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7819)) a6169d1, closes [#7819](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7819) [#7811](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7811) > * **ssr:** fix SSR for async functional components 882e719, closes [#7784](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7784) > * **ssr:** fix v-show inline style rendering when style binding is array ([#7814](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7814)) 1a979c4, closes [#7814](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7814) [#7813](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7813) > * fix wrongly matched named slots in functional components 62a922e, closes [#7817](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7817) > * named slots for nested functional components 6dd73e9, closes [#7710](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7710)
Commits - [`2534219`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/25342194016dc3bcc81cb3e8e229b0fb7ba1d1d6) build: release 2.5.16 - [`9089170`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/90891709708e8ebdc1522eed678a49eb9f312fda) build: build 2.5.16 - [`62a922e`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/62a922e865f5e578f67b386cb614abfc173d7851) fix: fix wrongly matched named slots in functional components - [`9084747`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/9084747e307dc9b415ff8e2a788c6a585a2a8f6c) fix(core): Make set/delete warning condition for undefined, null and ([#7818](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7818)) - [`1a979c4`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/1a979c44d6543d89f8a7e26ad7f995b1bf2aee3c) fix(ssr): fix v-show inline style rendering when style binding is array ([#7814](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7814)) - [`a6169d1`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/a6169d1eb71d64eacddf1738e72d21725e2bff00) fix(model): fix static input type being overwritten by v-bind object ([#7819](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7819)) - [`6dd73e9`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/6dd73e9ee44c09f04d3f616fcce18750a55e2e4f) fix: named slots for nested functional components - [`215f877`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/215f877d1b7eb6583f7adf15676ead8611f07379) fix(keep-alive): run prune after render for correct active component check - [`4378fc5`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/4378fc5124067c2b3a3517dd7f527edd9be2ad37) fix: fix keyName checking for arrow keys in IE11 - [`984927a`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/984927a1a98d10ad8af44f2accfb08d34d517610) fix: fix regression on duplicate component init when using shared data objects - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/compare/v2.5.15...v2.5.16)
